issues.title: Test comment left in production code
issues.description: A debug test comment '// test: 1766467207' is left in the codebase. This appears to be a temporary marker that should be removed.

issues.title: any type in ClaudeStreamMessage interface
issues.description: The 'content' property uses 'any[]' type which bypasses TypeScript type checking. Consider defining a proper ContentItem union type.

issues.title: any type in ClaudeStreamMessage interface
issues.description: The index signature '[key: string]: any' allows arbitrary properties without type safety. Consider using a discriminated union or stricter typing.

issues.title: any type in Session interface
issues.description: The 'todo_data' property uses 'any' type. Consider defining a proper TodoData interface.

issues.title: Console.log in API adapter
issues.description: Multiple console.log statements for debugging environment detection. These should use a proper logging utility or be removed for production.

issues.title: Console.log in claudeApi
issues.description: Debug console.log statement 'Raw result from get_claude_settings' should be removed for production.

issues.title: TRACE logging in handleStreamingCommand
issues.description: Excessive [TRACE] console.log statements throughout the handleStreamingCommand function. These are development traces that pollute production logs.
